instruction: Come up with a mathematical equation that when solution can give the average population of a village.
input: VillageA has a population of 100, VillageB has a population of 50 and VillageC has a population of 200
output:
The average population of the three villages can be calculated using the following equation:

Average population = (100 + 50 + 200) / 3 = 116.67.
